item.title: Example Event
item.description:
Slides can be added in a few ways:

  • Create slides using Wowchemy’s Slides feature and link using slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file
  • Upload an existing slide deck to static/ and link using url_slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file
  • Embed your slides (e.g. Google Slides) or presentation video on this page using shortcodes.

Further event details, including page elements such as image galleries, can be added to the body of this page.

item.title: Dr. Gao won a third place poster award at 2022 NYC Exposome Symposium
item.description: Congratulations to Dr. Gao for winning a third place poster award at 2022 NYC Exposome Symposium!

item.title: Dr. Gao won the JESEE Young Investigator Meeting Award from International Society of Exposure Science
item.description:
Congratulations to Dr. Gao for winning JESEE Young Investigator Meeting Award from International Society of Exposure Science!

Details can be found: https://intlexposurescience.org/2022-ises-awards/

item.title: Dr. Gao is running a special issue entitled " Human Health Effects of Chemical Mixture Exposures" in Chemosphere
item.description:
The prestigious journal Chemosphere is currently running a special issue entitled “Human Health Effects of Chemical Mixture Exposures”. As we are acting as guest editors for this issue, we would like to welcome contributions from various disciplines. We kindly invite you to consider submitting your full paper to this special issue.

Dr. Gao has served as an Editorial Board member for Chemosphere since March 2020! Please support this journal!

More details about this special issue can be found: https://www.sciencedirect.com/journal/chemosphere/about/forthcoming-special-issues#human-health-effects-of-chemical-mixture-exposures

item.title: Dr. Gao's exposome and multi-omics paper has been published in Genome Research as a cover article
item.description:
Congratulations to Dr. Gao for pulishing the first exposome and mutlti-omics integration study in Genome Research!

Details can be found: https://genome.cshlp.org/content/32/6.cover-expansion https://genome.cshlp.org/content/32/6/1199

item.title: Dr. Gao's first paper at Pitt on dermal exposure of heavy metal polluted soil has been published in Science of The Total Environment
item.description:
Congratulations to Dr. Gao for pulishing his first acritle at Pitt entitled “Dermal bioaccessibility and cytotoxicity of heavy metals in urban soils from a typical plateau city: Implication for human health” as the co-first author in Science of The Total Environment!

Details can be found: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0048969722026407?via%3Dihub

item.title: Dr. Gao was awarded the 2022 Excellent Reviewers Award from Critical Reviews in Environmental Science and Technology (CREST)
item.description:
Congratulations to Dr. Gao for being awarded the 2022 Excellent Reviewers Award from Critical Reviews in Environmental Science and Technology (CREST)! Dr. Gao also started to serve as a Young Editorial Board member for CREST from now on! Please support this journal!

More details about CREST can be found: https://www.tandfonline.com/journals/best20

item.title: Molecular mechanisms of PFOA-induced toxicity in animals and humans: Implications for health risks
Catabolism of (2E)-4-hydroxy-2-nonenal via ω-and ω-1-oxidation stimulated by ketogenic diet

Ionic liquid-based totally organic solvent-free emulsification microextraction coupled with high performance liquid chromatography for the determination of three acaricides in fruit juice
